about_the_game:
Warning: Some scenes contain violence and death, and may not be suitable for all viewers. Viewer discretion advised.

As long as the scars remain unhealed, the fight isn't over.

After returning from his latest mission abroad, John undergoes a profound transformation. Haunted by the trauma of his recent experience, he finds that he is no longer the person he once was, and this change is evident not only to him but also to those in his life. Though he has developed techniques to bury these painful memories deep within, they persistently resurface, threatening to consume him. In order to break free from this torment, John is compelled to confront the ghosts of his past and make a pivotal decision.

Will he find the strength to make the correct choice?

VR EXPERIENCE

Abstractly exploring and depicting the invisible impacts of altered mental health, MINDFIELD is an immersive experience focuses on how John, an army veteran, has his life altered by his post-traumatic stress disorder. The audience will delve inside his memories, transported to the core of the emotional rift he experienced during a more chaotic time of war. Will John be able to open up about his past to a loved one, freeing himself partially from the burden he bears? Or will he remain stuck in this loop of hopelessness?

The person that can determine John's fate... is you!

ADDRESSING POST-TRAUMATIC STRESS DISORDER

The film's objective is to sensitize the viewer towards how PTSD can influence the experience of daily life, making them a witness of imagery depicting the character's inner state of turmoil, as well as exposing them to a painful memory of trauma. The film searches to evoke empathy, but also to provoke a questioning towards traumatic experiences, their impacts and the healing process.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, Oculus Touch, Vive controllers
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR only, Oculus Touch, Vive controllers
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: Experience the powerful VR short film, Mindfield, delving deep into the world of PTSD. Immerse yourself in this thought-provoking journey and witness the invisible scars of war in a whole new way.
